attributes.action: turn our street lights back in in great/ little wakering
attributes.additional_details: Great wakering and little wakering lights to come back on or even half. There seems to be lights in areas that are not needed ie near shops etc. Wakering is a small village and having lights out is very scary as there are lots of fields and quieter areas. It seems to be a invite for criminal activity Alexander road has already been targeted and im sure it will not stop there.
